SummaryEnglish: A look at the daily life of a pair of twins - both named Alice - and their older brother, who has a sister complex. Them eating meals, getting into fights, playing with friends... Would you like to peek at the heart-full daily life of the cute Alices?
Aliases: Alice or Alice: Siscon Niisan to Futago no Imouto
ありすorありす ～シスコン兄さんと双子の妹～

1.TitleEnglish: A Sister-holic Brother and His Twin Sisters
1.SummaryEnglish: Oh, no! As if getting up in the morning isn’t tough enough, Airi isn’t feeling well. How will Big Brother cheer her up?

2.SummaryEnglish: Cooking is more fun with friends! Maco and her buxom sister Coco visit and help Big Brother make breakfast.

3.SummaryEnglish: What a long day! After meeting Big Brother's friend Kisaki, the girls take turns working on their waitressing skills.

4.SummaryEnglish: You never know where you're going to make a new friend! After an unexpected encounter, the gang help Ruha find the perfect snack.

5.TitleEnglish: Everyone Goes to the Hot Springs?!
5.SummaryEnglish: There's nothing more relaxing than an afternoon in a hot spring! After a quick dip, the gang enjoys some festival fun but someone is missing...

6.SummaryEnglish: Warm weather means it's time for a trip to the beach! While the gang enjoys playing in the ocean, Airi is hesitant to join them.

7.TitleEnglish: A Rival Appears?! Yamiry has Arrived!
7.SummaryEnglish: There's a new restaurant in town! While the gang checks out the new eatery, Kisaki receives a challenge.

8.SummaryEnglish: It's time to battle! Big Brother has to decide who's café is better: Kisaki's or Yamiry's.

9.TitleEnglish: A Heart-pounding New Year's?! It's a Sweet Sake Panic!
9.SummaryEnglish: Happy New Year! Airi and Rise celebrate with a sweet cup of sake and Big Brother's zoni when unexpected visitors show up.

10.SummaryEnglish: It's time for a chocolate showdown! Yamiry and Kisaki battle over who has the best chocolate but Yamiry has a secret weapon.

11.SummaryEnglish: It's time to celebrate! Even though it's Airi and Rise's special day, they want to help Big Brother by making him a yummy dinner.

12.SummaryEnglish: It's time to dance and sing! Kisaki recruits the girls into her pop group and while Airi and Rise are very nervous, Big Brother is there to cheer them on.

13.SummaryEnglish: Oh, what fun (and delicious treats) there's been with Airi, Rise and the whole gang!
